body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Brian Price. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Brian, I'm interested in purchasing a car and I have a few questions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help you with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Cheryl Wood.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Cheryl. Could you tell me what kind of car you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a reliable sedan, preferably something with good fuel efficiency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Could I have your phone number, Cheryl, so that I can follow up with you if needed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Cheryl. Also, can you let me know your email address so we can send you some options and offers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's cheryl.wood@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you. I'll send you some information about sedans that match your preferences. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Brian.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Cheryl. Thank you for your time, and feel free to contact us if you have any more questions. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Brian Price and the customer's name is Cheryl Wood.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
